item.description:
Sunday, November 16th, 2008 - early evening, 5:15pm, at Vinny T's Restaurant, Liberty Tree Mall, Danvers. Thanks Jill for organizing this event! Members who are going to the theater beforehand should get there between 5 and 5:15 depending on traffic.

(note- there is NO Patriot's game this particular Sunday, so come on out!!)

Vinny T’s of Boston — Neighborhood Italian Dining

Please join us for a early Sunday evening get-together at Vinny T's.
This is scheduled to follow the NSMT 42nd Street matinee performance meetup, but all are welcome to attend!!

You can choose theatre and dinner, just theatre, or just dinner! Or just come and join us for the bread!! We welcome your company!!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: ANNOUNCING our next CHEAP EATS SOCIAL!!
